Title: Bad to the Bone
Plot: The investigation of a violent murder in a casino parking garage leads to a missing woman, a long-dead body and a missing child.
GuestStars: Xander Berkeley, Megan Follows, Erik Passoja, Dale Dickey, David Hall, Mark Kelly, Amee Jean McClure, Angelica Pulido, Megan Follows, Eric Passoja, David Hall, Josh Stewart, Xander Berkeley
